skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stamp my passport
des:
Ever wanted to learn every country in the world? Stamp My Passport makes it easy. The skill features a simple learning platform; just choose one continent to learn at a time. Along your journey, you'll also pick up on the capitals and languages spoken in each country.

Once you guess a country right without any help, you get that country stamped onto your passport. When you return to the skill, you may choose a continent and say "review". You'll be able to review only the countries you've stamped from that continent.

Other features include:

- Ask to show the location of a country. "Show me Libya"
- Create unique passports for each user in the household. "Create a passport"
- Delete passports. "Delete a passport" 
- Pick a continent. "North America"
- Pick a mode. "Learn" to learn, "Review" to review stamped countries
- Pick both a mode and a continent. "Learn/Review North America"
- Ask for help on the game rules. "Help"
- Personalized Amazon Polly voices for each continent

The skill is multimodal, as it shows images of the countries. It should work fine on the Echo Show and Spot, and Fire TV. To use the skill on a voice-only device such as an Echo or Echo Dot, please click on the 'Activity' tab of the Home page on the Alexa app, or go to alexa.amazon.com. Then you will be able to view questions and maps of countries.
